# desiredImmersiveViewingMode

**Instance Property**

The viewer’s selected immersive-viewing mode.

## Declaration

```swift
var desiredImmersiveViewingMode: VideoPlayerComponent.ImmersiveViewingMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

This is the immersive-viewing mode that the current immersive-viewing mode transitions to.

## Playing immersive media

- **immersiveViewingMode**: The current immersive-viewing mode.
title: desiredImmersiveViewingMode
